params.data: The resulting data from the call. This is error data when the call was not a success. Otherwise,                this is malformed data when the call was a success.
params.success: If the call to the token was a success.

params.token: The yield token to claim rewards for.

returns._0: The amount of reward tokens claimed.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

ERC20CallFailed(address,bool,bytes).notice: An error used to indicate that a call to an ERC20 contract failed.

IllegalState(string).notice: An error used to indicate that a function has encountered an unrecoverable state.

claimAndDonateRewards(address,uint256).notice: Claims rewards tokens, swaps for debt tokens.

getExpectedExchange().notice: Gets expected exchange for OP to debt token.
